How Does Scatter Help Publishers?

New Revenue Stream

Make your content available to marketers. And make new revenues without adding even a pixel on your content destination.

Increased Traffic

Creating a brand safe environment will enable marketers push out your content on their owned platforms, thus adding new traffic to your digital assets.

Improved Social Quotient

Your content parading in its own uniform across the social landscape allows it a tremendous boost. Now, up that social quotient!

Want to know more? Download our FAQ

PDF Format - 247 KB

Easy Integration

Integration has never been easier. Two extremely friendly options allow you to make the best decision on what works best in your interest. Once you've taken this call, we’ll showcase your content to top marketers and create a brand safe link for them.

New Audiences

Go where no publisher has gone before. Scatter’s diverse and rich client base will ensure that your content travels - and travels well. Marketers will now see value in distributing this content on their painstakingly built communities.

Resurface content

There is a lot of great content you generate, but there is minimal space and time to showcase it. Scatter allows this content to be rediscovered by brands and sampled by very relevant audiences.

Monetize Content

Now make new revenues. And, you don’t need to create any new space on your asset to generate these revenues. Scatter ensures this money – but not at the cost of audiences!

Scatter is the first product from Spiral Content Solutions Pvt. Ltd. Our team boasts of several years of varied experience across firms like MTV, Blackstone and BBC etc. We believe this is a great time to realize our collective dream of creating exceptional content experiences by connecting content creators to brands.

From former media executives to fresh graduates, our team is a great balance of experience & new blood. Our shared love and vision for digital marketing brings us together. Our ambition is to create “simple to use” products that help brands connect with their audiences.
